## FileBackend class

Encrypted file fallback backend.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FileBackend implements SecretBackend 
```
**Implements:** [SecretBackend](./vaultkeeper.secretbackend.md)

## Remarks

Available on all platforms. Stores secrets as AES-256-GCM encrypted files using Node.js native crypto â€” no external tools required. Not as secure as OS-native keystores, but provides a portable fallback.
